nodes.text: There is however no scientific evidence linking that directly with the sites; a number of other factors may be involved socio-economic factors for example
The relation between the hazardous landfill and birth defects is not direct and specific
Only if there is a specific and direct correlation between the two phenomena the argument is valid
As my hon. Friend says one study reveals a higher incidence of birth defects around not just hazardous landfill sites but landfill sites in general.
Only if the birth defects are related only to hazardous landfill sites the relation is specific and direct
